__e: All I want to do is live and worship and kill in solitude and die in peace!
Family that never calls and friends that don't really get you and feeling alone and wrong until it crushes you?
Now he knows that those who should have loved him threw him into loneliness and pain.
You have family. You cannot know what isolation means.
The real loneliness is living among all these kind people who only ask you to pretend.
Could it be possible that my lonely days are over?
